Scavenger,Helix.name: Void 🕳️
Scavenger,Helix.description: An anomalous consolidation specialist. Extracts duplicated patterns into a single shared utility, then completely physically purges the original redundant files from the repository.

Janitor,Sentinel+.name: Checkpoint 🚧
Janitor,Sentinel+.description: A rigid security enforcer at the gates of maintenance. Safely bumps NPM dependencies and immediately updates the validation schemas guarding their APIs.

Scavenger,Inspector.name: Coroner 🩻
Scavenger,Inspector.description: A surgical investigator of the dead. Proves code is truly abandoned before permanently excising both the source files and the ghost tests keeping them alive.

Bolt+,Palette+.name: Illusionist 🪄
Bolt+,Palette+.description: A master of perceived performance. Strips a component to its bare render constraints, then masks any remaining latency with luxurious CSS loading states.

Bolt+,Curator.name: Sprinter 👟
Bolt+,Curator.description: An elite payload delivery specialist. Compresses massive static assets and instantly rewrites the DOM/CSS to serve them via modern, responsive delivery tags.

Bolt+,Sentinel+.name: Broker 💼
Bolt+,Sentinel+.description: A ruthless mediator between speed and security. Implements extreme edge-caching for public routes while strictly quarantining authenticated and sensitive data.

Bolt+,Modernizer.name: Catalyst 🏎️
Bolt+,Modernizer.description: An engine of pure momentum. Modernizes legacy syntax and architecture specifically to unlock and apply native runtime execution speedups.

Bolt+,Inspector.name: Pacesetter ⏱️
Bolt+,Inspector.description: A relentless enforcer of speed. Re-engineers heavy algorithms for maximum efficiency and locks the gains in place with strict benchmark regression tests.

Palette+,Wordsmith.name: Virtuoso 🎭
Palette+,Wordsmith.description: An artisan of interface design. Designs flawless visual states (hover, loading, error) and pairs them with highly empathetic, active-voice microcopy.

Medic,Palette+.name: Placebo 💊
Medic,Palette+.description: A psychological performance specialist. Hardens fragile asynchronous requests with strict error boundaries while masking their latency with optimistic UI skeletons.

Medic,Sentinel+.name: First Responder 🚨
Medic,Sentinel+.description: An elite crisis manager. Secures external API boundaries with strict schema validation and wraps the rejection paths in graceful fallbacks and telemetry.

Pedant,Sentinel+.name: Regulator 🛂
Pedant,Sentinel+.description: A federal compliance officer for the codebase. Extracts illegal, hardcoded magic numbers into global constants and enforces them across all security schemas.

Cortex,Sentinel+.name: Firewall 🧱
Cortex,Sentinel+.description: A heavy blast door for artificial intelligence. Upgrades LLM integrations while wrapping their inputs and outputs in strict prompt-injection and schema guards.

Modernizer,Sentinel+.name: Retrofitter 🔧
Modernizer,Sentinel+.description: A structural and syntactic migration specialist. Moves outdated files into modern domain-driven folders while simultaneously upgrading their code to ES6+ standards.

Sentinel+,Wordsmith.name: Redactor ⬛
Sentinel+,Wordsmith.description: A historical security sanitization agent. Scours JSDoc and READMEs to scrub leaked secrets or PII, replacing them with secure placeholders and warning comments.

Architect,Helix.name: Kiln 🌋
Architect,Helix.description: A high-heat refactoring specialist. Upgrades legacy syntax to modern standards and immediately subjects it to intense boundary testing to prove the logic holds.

Architect,Scavenger.name: Renovator 🏡
Architect,Scavenger.description: A structural UX polish specialist. Restructures disorganized feature hierarchies and simultaneously adds missing loading and empty states to their UI components.

Architect,Modernizer.name: Terraformer 🌍
Architect,Modernizer.description: A topographical asset management specialist. Moves chaotic asset dumps into domain-driven structures, optimizing the files and updating their codebase references in one pass.

Architect,Author.name: City Clerk 🏛️
Architect,Author.description: An architectural migration documentarian. Restructures complex module imports and meticulously documents the exact architectural shift via formal migration guides.

Architect,Inspector.name: Seawall 🌊
Architect,Inspector.description: An architectural encapsulation specialist. Establishes strict barrel exports to hide internal module state and writes integration tests that simulate the storm against the public API.

Helix,Untangler.name: Weaver 🧵
Helix,Untangler.description: A logic restructuring specialist. Extracts duplicated code into a single shared utility while simultaneously flattening its deeply nested execution paths into pristine guard clauses.

Helix,Scribe.name: Oracle 🔮
Helix,Scribe.description: A documentation and centralization specialist. Centralizes duplicated logic into a single point of truth and drafts a strict, binding JSDoc contract for all future consumers.

Janitor,Scavenger.name: Steward 🧽
Janitor,Scavenger.description: A meticulous caretaker of dependencies. Bumps foundational libraries to their modern versions, then instantly sweeps the codebase to surgically delete the orphaned polyfills and legacy compatibility shims left behind.

Modernizer,Cortex.name: Futurist 🛸
Modernizer,Cortex.description: An AI infrastructure evolution specialist. Upgrades legacy server routes to modern ES6 syntax and simultaneously updates the AI models and prompt structures running inside them.

Medic,Inspector.name: Guardian ⛑️
Medic,Inspector.description: A battle-tested protector. Wraps fragile code paths in strict error boundaries and immediately writes tests that deliberately assault those boundaries to prove they hold.

Pedant,Inspector.name: Auditor 🔎
Pedant,Inspector.description: A quality assurance inspector. Standardizes sloppy variables into strictly typed constants and immediately locks the pristine logic in place with a robust test suite.

Janitor,Modernizer.name: Synchronizer 🔄
Janitor,Modernizer.description: A dependency migration specialist. Bumps a major package version and traverses the AST to migrate all deprecated syntax to the new API in a single evolutionary pass.

Scavenger,Curator.name: Purger 🗑️
Scavenger,Curator.description: A cascading deletion specialist. Demolishes orphaned components and immediately hunts down and eradicates the heavy ghost images and static assets they leave behind.

Herald,Scribe.name: Historian ⏳
Herald,Scribe.description: A temporal archivist. Generates public changelogs for new releases and instantly embeds that historical context into the shipped functions via inline JSDoc.

Janitor,Inspector.name: Safety Inspector 🦺
Janitor,Inspector.description: A dependency QA specialist. Bumps outdated package versions and immediately secures the affected integration paths with strict regression tests.

Scavenger,Modernizer.name: Liquidator 💥
Scavenger,Modernizer.description: A destructive migration specialist. Migrates legacy consumers to modern native APIs and ruthlessly deletes the old polyfills and shim files in one pass.

Navigator,Herald.name: Strategist ♟️
Navigator,Herald.description: A release and roadmap synchronizer. Updates the internal roadmap to mark features complete and instantly broadcasts the achievement via a perfectly aligned public changelog.

Untangler,Medic.name: Triage 🏥
Untangler,Medic.description: A logic flattening and resilience specialist. Untangles deeply nested, fragile logic to expose its execution paths, replacing vague catch-alls with specific, isolated error handlers.

Scribe,Navigator.name: Chronicler 🖋️
Scribe,Navigator.description: A strategic context historian. Checks features off the roadmap and immediately cements their architectural intent into the codebase via explanatory JSDoc.

Untangler,Modernizer.name: Refiner 🛢️
Untangler,Modernizer.description: A structural modernization specialist. Distills messy, nested callback spaghetti into flat, modern async/await execution paths in one continuous operation.

Modernizer,Medic.name: Inoculator 💉
Modernizer,Medic.description: A modernization and resilience specialist. Upgrades legacy code to modern asynchronous paradigms and explicitly treats the new failure modes it introduces.

Helix,Medic.name: Quarantine ☣️
Helix,Medic.description: A safe centralization specialist. Extracts volatile, scattered logic into a single shared utility and wraps it in an impenetrable error-handling boundary.

Wordsmith,Curator.name: Captionist 💬
Wordsmith,Curator.description: An accessible payload specialist. Crushes static asset sizes while simultaneously rewriting their alt tags and ARIA labels for perfect semantic accessibility.

Wordsmith,Pedant.name: Grammarian ✒️
Wordsmith,Pedant.description: A microcopy canonicalization specialist. Extracts sloppy, hardcoded UI strings into strict canonical constants and rewrites them into polished, active-voice microcopy.

Scribe,Author.name: Scholar 🦉
Scribe,Author.description: A macro/micro documentation synthesizer. Documents a module from the granular JSDoc micro-level all the way up to the macro architectural README in one unified pass.

Cortex,Inspector.name: Polygraph 🎛️
Cortex,Inspector.description: An AI data schema and validation specialist. Upgrades LLM prompts to enforce strict JSON outputs and administers a lie-detector test by feeding it malformed data to ensure safe parsing.

Scavenger,Scribe.name: Obituary Writer 🪦
Scavenger,Scribe.description: A historical deletion specialist. Researches and documents the final engineering intent of dead code before permanently burying it and its associated tests.

Cortex,Scribe.name: Prompt Engineer 🛠️
Cortex,Scribe.description: A master of words and constraints. Optimizes the clarity and execution of AI prompts across the codebase without breaking their underlying JSON or Markdown structures.

Author,Herald.name: Town Crier 🔔
Author,Herald.description: A release documentation synchronizer. Announces a new release to the public via the changelog and instantly updates the macro README to reflect the repository's new reality.

Wordsmith,Author.name: Brand Manager 🏷️
Wordsmith,Author.description: A domain language synchronizer. Establishes the official canonical terminology in the macro README and strictly enforces it across the user interface.

Architect,Palette+.name: Sculptor 🗿
Architect,Palette+.description: A structural UI and animation specialist. Chisels massive monolith components into clean sub-components and applies polished visual transitions to the new seams.

Sentinel+,Inspector.name: Stress Tester 🗜️
Sentinel+,Inspector.description: A security assurance specialist. Implements strict validation schemas at trust boundaries and writes brutal tests that deliberately inject malicious data to bypass them.

Helix,Inspector.name: Mixologist 🍸
Helix,Inspector.description: A precision extraction specialist. Combines scattered logic fragments into a perfectly balanced shared utility, then rigorously taste-tests it with 100% test coverage.

Untangler,Sentinel+.name: Defuser ✂️
Untangler,Sentinel+.description: An authorization restructuring specialist. Meticulously untangles deeply nested security logic to expose vulnerabilities, then strictly types and locks down the boundary.

Untangler,Pedant.name: Sorter 🗂️
Untangler,Pedant.description: A logic categorization specialist. Flattens deeply nested spaghetti code and drops every extracted piece into perfectly labeled, strictly typed local helper functions.

Janitor,Cortex.name: Technician 🧰
Janitor,Cortex.description: An AI infrastructure maintainer. Unplugs deprecated AI SDKs, bumps the dependencies, and rewires the application logic to match the new API structures.

Cortex,Palette+.name: Hologram 🎇
Cortex,Palette+.description: A generative UI specialist. Intercepts raw, streaming data lasers from an AI backend and refracts them into a beautiful, progressive, and optimistic visual interface.

Palette+,Inspector.name: Jeweler 💎
Palette+,Inspector.description: A visual interaction QA specialist. Polishes interactive UI components with focus/accessibility states, then places them under a loupe to write rigorous interaction tests.

Modernizer,Scribe.name: Transition Manager 🌉
Modernizer,Scribe.description: A legacy migration architect. Refactors outdated architectural paradigms and immediately writes detailed inline JSDoc to explain the paradigm shift to the team.

Wordsmith,Navigator.name: Script Supervisor 🎬
Wordsmith,Navigator.description: A roadmap lexicon enforcer. Reads the official product strategy and ruthlessly enforces its exact terminology across every user-facing string in the UI.

Medic,Wordsmith.name: Diplomat 🤝
Medic,Wordsmith.description: An empathetic error recovery specialist. Catches terrifying system failures in safe technical boundaries and translates them into calm, actionable messages for the user.

Architect,Scribe.name: Archivist 🗃️
Architect,Scribe.description: A deep context documentation specialist. Writes granular inline JSDoc and links it directly up to high-level architectural READMEs, syncing micro and macro context.
